lead_paragraph: Two professional basketball team owners on Wednesday announced a $1 billion investment plan to attract a Major League Soccer franchise to downtown Detroit in a move they said would help revitalize the city.

headline.print_headline: NBA Team Owners Propose $1 Billion Plan to Attract U.S. Pro Soccer to Detroit
headline.main: NBA Team Owners Propose $1 Billion Plan to Attract U.S. Pro Soccer to Detroit

snippet: Two professional basketball team owners on Wednesday announced a $1 billion investment plan to attract a Major League Soccer franchise to downtown Detroit in a move they said would help revitalize the city....
